item.title: Stuffed blue cheese burger with cream cheese, avocado and basil
item.description: photo by denisb I used 1 kg of normal ground meat for 4 burgers, and seasoned with salt, pepper, paprika powder, two ts of bbq sauce, a squirt of mint chilli sauce. To make the burgers, I use a stuffed burger press, and make a cup for the filling. To make the filling, take a box of cream cheese and whip it a bit to loosen. Dice an avocado, slice some basil leaves, and mix it in.
